description:
My place is close to BAM Peter Jay Sharp Building, TFANA, Greenlight Bookstore, Barclay's Center, Atlantic Terminal. 

It's a cozy bright apartment on the top floor of an artsy Brooklyn Building, right above a coffee shop.

Great Location. 
-right outside the Lafayette C Train, a block away from the Fulton G. 
-6 minute walk to Atlantic/Pacific Q/B/N/R/2/3/4/5 & LIRR
-lots of great wine bars, german beer gardens and great restaurants on Fulton St, Lafayette Ave and DeKalb Ave.

- 1 bedroom w/queen bed
- 1 art studio w/full-sized air mattress
- Comfy sofa
- Easy street parking 
- Laundromat around the corner
- Wi-Fi 
- Full kitchen with typical appliances
- Flatscreen with roku (hulu, netflix, hbogo, cnn)

I travel a lot for work and have neighbors. 
My neighbors or myself will meet you with keys and help you get acclimated. I also will send you a document with everything you need to know.

Fort Greene is a uniquely lovely neighborhood, with Art-house movie theaters, Concert venues, Opera and Theater Venues and fantastic restaurants. 
It is also a 15-20 minute subway ride into Union Square/Manhattan and is off literally all the trains and LIRR.
name: 1.5 Bedroom in Fantastic Fort Greene!
review: Sara's apartment is perfect for an individual or couple looking for a cozy base from which to explore Brooklyn. Immaculately clean, tastefully furnished and fantastically located.
